meanings.definition: Grizzliest: superlative form of grizzly, meaning extremely fierce or terrifying
meanings.sent1: The grizzliest bear in the forest scared all the other animals away.
meanings.sent2: The grizzliest storm we had ever seen left a trail of destruction behind.
meanings.sent3: The grizzliest part of the horror movie made everyone jump in their seats.
meanings.sent4: Her scream was the grizzliest sound in the silent night.
meanings.sent5: The grizzliest nightmare haunted him for days.

meanings.definition: Grizzliest: superlative form of grizzly, meaning having gray or streaked hair
meanings.sent1: The grizzliest wolf in the pack had a majestic silver coat.
meanings.sent2: Grandpa's grizzliest beard made him look wise and experienced.
meanings.sent3: The grizzliest cat in the neighborhood was known for its unique fur color.
meanings.sent4: The grizzliest clouds in the sky signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The grizzliest squirrel had a mix of gray and brown fur.

meanings.definition: Grizzliest: superlative form of grizzly, meaning most unpleasant or disagreeable
meanings.sent1: The grizzliest taste in the soup came from the burnt onions.
meanings.sent2: The grizzliest smell in the room made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent3: The grizzliest part of the movie was the boring dialogue scenes.
meanings.sent4: The grizzliest task of the day was cleaning the clogged drain.
meanings.sent5: The grizzliest noise in the house was the broken doorbell.
